name: venge_crown_meepo_rival_01
text: I helped you live in Skywrath. Now I've corrected that mistake.

name: venge_crown_monologue_a_01
text: I was to be queen. But behind my back, my sister plotted.
text_simple: i was to be queen but behind my back my sister plotted

name: venge_crown_monologue_a_02_03
text: On the eve of my ascension, her conspirators surrounded me.
text_simple: on the eve of my ascension her conspirators surrounded me

name: venge_crown_monologue_a_03
text: Tore the wings from my body. Cast me from the highest tower. I fell.
text_simple: tore the wings from my body cast me from the highest tower i fell

name: venge_crown_monologue_a_04_03
text: At the muddy banks of the Pas?re I lay near death. Broken. Wingless.
text_simple: at the muddy banks of the pasre i lay near death broken wingless

name: venge_crown_monologue_a_05_03
text: That was where Scree'Auk found me. And gave me new life as a spirit of vengeance.
text_simple: that was where screeauk found me and gave me new life as a spirit of vengeance

name: venge_crown_monologue_a_06
text: And yet revenge against my sister could never be mine. For I could never return.
text_simple: and yet revenge against my sister could never be mine for i could never return

name: venge_crown_monologue_a_07_02
text: And my beloved's life was bound to her that killed me. We were hopeless.
text_simple: and my beloveds life was bound to her that killed me we were hopeless

name: venge_crown_monologue_a_08_03
text: Until Scree'Auk's final gift was given. ALL of her power.
text_simple: until screeauks final gift was given all of her power

name: venge_crown_monologue_a_09_04
text: So that I might slay Imperia. And return to my throne.
text_simple: so that i might slay imperia and return to my throne

name: venge_crown_monologue_c_02
text: Her thirst for power turned me into a monster.
text_simple: her thirst for power turned me into a monster

name: venge_crown_monologue_c_03
text: Broken in body, but clear of mind.
text_simple: broken in body but clear of mind

name: venge_crown_monologue_c_04_04
text: Her treachery could not go unpunished.
text_simple: her treachery could not go unpunished

name: venge_crown_monologue_c_05_02
text: She robbed me of my kingdom.
text_simple: she robbed me of my kingdom

name: venge_crown_monologue_c_07_02
text: And so I return. To claim my throne.
text_simple: and so i return to claim my throne

name: venge_crown_monologue_c_08_04
text: But first to claim her head.
text_simple: but first to claim her head

name: venge_crown_monologue_e_03
text: An imposter. Who pushes the legitimate offspring from the nest.
text_simple: an imposter who pushes the legitimate offspring from the nest

name: venge_crown_monologue_e_04
text: As you so deceitfully pushed me off my throne.
text_simple: as you so deceitfully pushed me off my throne

name: venge_crown_monologue_e_05
text: Mine, by the ancient laws of the Skywrath.
text_simple: mine by the ancient laws of the skywrath

name: venge_crown_monologue_e_06
text: But I will have it back.
text_simple: but i will have it back

name: venge_crown_monologue_e_07
text: And I will smash you like an egg!
text_simple: and i will smash you like an egg

name: venge_crown_monologue_f_02
text: Usurped by my own dear, loving SISTER.
text_simple: usurped by my own dear loving sister

name: venge_crown_monologue_f_03_02
text: My wings, destroyed. Torn from my body.
text_simple: my wings destroyed torn from my body

name: venge_crown_monologue_f_05
text: Well, if it's blood they want...
text_simple: well if its blood they want

name: venge_crown_monologue_f_07
text: It will rain down on Skywrath and fill her nest.
text_simple: it will rain down on skywrath and fill her nest

name: venge_crown_monologue_f_08
text: She will drown in it. I shall be avenged.
text_simple: she will drown in it i shall be avenged

name: venge_crown_move_pain_03
text: Every step is torture -- nothing new.
text_simple: every step is torture nothing new

name: venge_crown_move_pain_06
text: I've been wounded worse than this.
text_simple: ive been wounded worse than this

name: venge_crown_move_pain_10
text: This agony is a debt to be repaid.
text_simple: this agony is a debt to be repaid

name: venge_crown_outpost_01
text: I claim this in Scree'auk's name.
text_simple: i claim this in screeauks name

name: venge_crown_pudge_ally_01
text: I never wanted to see you again. But... We'll temporarily set that aside.
text_simple: i never wanted to see you again but well temporarily set that aside

name: venge_crown_pudge_ally_02
text: I am not a bird. Don't look at me like that.
text_simple: i am not a bird dont look at me like that

name: venge_crown_pudge_ally_03
text: You can't still be hungry after all those flightless.
text_simple: you cant still be hungry after all those flightless

name: venge_crown_pudge_ally_04
text: You again. You're just a stomach with legs, aren't you?
text_simple: you again youre just a stomach with legs arent you

name: venge_crown_pudge_rival_01
text: I would have let you feast in the middens of my kingdom forever. But no one bites the queen.
text_simple: i would have let you feast in the middens of my kingdom forever but no one bites the queen

name: venge_crown_purch_02
text: This will be of great use.
text_simple: this will be of great use

name: venge_crown_rare_01
text: What wretch here is worth my vengeance?
text_simple: what wretch here is worth my vengeance

name: venge_crown_rare_02
text: Is there anyhing so noble as revenge?
text_simple: is there anyhing so noble as revenge

name: venge_crown_rare_04
text: In time, Skywrath will breathe again. She will flourish.
text_simple: in time skywrath will breathe again she will flourish

name: venge_crown_rare_07
text: I shall lay waste to all who oppose me.
text_simple: i shall lay waste to all who oppose me

name: venge_crown_rare_09
text: Revenge my only aim, my foes must fall.
text_simple: revenge my only aim my foes must fall

name: venge_crown_rare_10
text: Scree'auk, hear my cries. Bring me strength to dash my enemies.
text_simple: screeauk hear my cries bring me strength to dash my enemies

name: venge_crown_rare_11
text: I will bring justice. I will bring death.
text_simple: i will bring justice i will bring death

name: venge_crown_respawn_02
text: I rise from the ashes, and soar.
text_simple: i rise from the ashes and soar

name: venge_crown_respawn_06
text: I pass once more from the veil.
text_simple: i pass once more from the veil

name: venge_crown_respawn_08
text: The Queen was dead. Long live the Queen.
text_simple: the queen was dead long live the queen

name: venge_crown_respawn_09
text: My quest for vengeance starts anew.
text_simple: my quest for vengeance starts anew

name: venge_crown_respawn_12
text_simple: my mission remains unfulfilled for now

name: venge_crown_respawn_13
text: This time, I will not fall.
text_simple: this time i will not fall

name: venge_crown_respawn_16
text: I return to reclaim my throne.
text_simple: i return to reclaim my throne

name: venge_crown_respawn_17
text: Death itself could not hold me.
text_simple: death itself could not hold me

name: venge_crown_respawn_81_14
text: I'll meet death on my own terms.
text_simple: ill meet death on my own terms

name: venge_crown_riki_ally_01
text: Dragonus didn't think that you would fight for me. It was wise of you to pay this debt.
text_simple: dragonus didnt think that you would fight for me it was wise of you to pay this debt

name: venge_crown_riki_ally_02
text: Steer clear of Dragonus. He never really liked you. Following that, steer clear of me.
text_simple: steer clear of dragonus he never really liked you following that steer clear of me

name: venge_crown_riki_ally_03
text: Did you ever find that blacksmith?
text_simple: did you ever find that blacksmith

name: venge_crown_riki_ally_04
text: What WAS that blacksmith's bounty, I wonder?
text_simple: what was that blacksmiths bounty i wonder

name: venge_crown_riki_rival_01
text: I should have killed you in Skywrath. Just for the stink.
text_simple: i should have killed you in skywrath just for the stink

name: venge_crown_riki_rival_02
text: I don't need assassins. I learned long ago how to kill for myself.
text_simple: i dont need assassins i learned long ago how to kill for myself

name: venge_crown_riki_rival_03
text: So here's where you ran off to...
text_simple: so heres where you ran off to

name: venge_crown_riki_rival_04
text: I should have killed you back at Midgate.
text_simple: i should have killed you back at midgate

name: venge_crown_rival_001
text: I flap my wings and you -- disappear.
text_simple: i flap my wings and you disappear

name: venge_crown_rival_003
text: Why must I waste my time on this?
text_simple: why must i waste my time on this

name: venge_crown_rival_007
text: I admire the zeal, but not the quest.
text_simple: i admire the zeal but not the quest

name: venge_crown_rival_011
text: You never understood what it meant to lead.
text_simple: you never understood what it meant to lead

name: venge_crown_rival_013
text: What power could you have over me?
text_simple: what power could you have over me

name: venge_crown_rival_015
text: I should stake you out for the crows.
text_simple: i should stake you out for the crows

name: venge_crown_rival_016
text: Can you fly without your bat? Let's throw you off a peak.
text_simple: can you fly without your bat lets throw you off a peak

name: venge_crown_rival_019
text: I'm soaked in blood. But you'll get none from me.
text_simple: im soaked in blood but youll get none from me

name: venge_crown_rival_021
text: Like I said -- our business is done.
text_simple: like i said our business is done

name: venge_crown_rival_033
text: You're lucky we're not in Skywrath. They'd have you hunted down for sport.
text_simple: youre lucky were not in skywrath theyd have you hunted down for sport

name: venge_crown_rival_043
text: Young... You remind me of my sister.
text_simple: young you remind me of my sister

name: venge_crown_rival_045
text: I fight for my kingdom. You fight for a dead cause.
text_simple: i fight for my kingdom you fight for a dead cause

name: venge_crown_rival_049
text: I pity you, Krobelus. Let this be a brief release.
text_simple: i pity you krobelus let this be a brief release

name: venge_crown_rival_051
text: I thought you were the one who knew better.
text_simple: i thought you were the one who knew better

name: venge_crown_rival_053
text: I already made a deal with the devil. A better one than you.
text_simple: i already made a deal with the devil a better one than you

name: venge_crown_rival_055
text: We take no pleasure in this.
text_simple: we take no pleasure in this

name: venge_crown_rival_057
text: Poor ranger. Flying targets are much harder to hit.
text_simple: poor ranger flying targets are much harder to hit

name: venge_crown_rival_063
text: You played your part in this.
text_simple: you played your part in this

name: venge_crown_rival_065
text: A simple gust to extinguish your flame.
text_simple: a simple gust to extinguish your flame

name: venge_crown_rival_071
text: I won't let the schemes of outsiders harm those in Skywrath again.
text_simple: i wont let the schemes of outsiders harm those in skywrath again

name: venge_crown_rival_077
text: Reduced to a ratter, dealing with pests.
text_simple: reduced to a ratter dealing with pests

name: venge_crown_rival_083
text: Study all the spells you want. You can't go face to face with a queen.
text_simple: study all the spells you want you cant go face to face with a queen

name: venge_crown_rival_103
text: You're just a twisted thief. At least MY cause was just.
text_simple: youre just a twisted thief at least my cause was just

name: venge_crown_rival_131
text: What am I, a gardener? How hard can it be to kill a weed?
text_simple: what am i a gardener how hard can it be to kill a weed

name: venge_crown_rival_133
text: You have a twisted sense of self-importance. And that's coming from a queen.
text_simple: you have a twisted sense of selfimportance and thats coming from a queen

name: venge_crown_rival_139
text: You should have just cracked your own skulls together and saved us all the trouble.
text_simple: you should have just cracked your own skulls together and saved us all the trouble

name: venge_crown_rival_167
text: Better to kill you here than find your dagger in my back.
text_simple: better to kill you here than find your dagger in my back

name: venge_crown_rival_169
text: You don't look like magus royalty to me.
text_simple: you dont look like magus royalty to me

name: venge_crown_rival_177
text: You should have saved your shackles for the real threat -- me.
text_simple: you should have saved your shackles for the real threat me

name: venge_crown_rival_179
text: WE decide who is silent and who can speak.
text_simple: we decide who is silent and who can speak

name: venge_crown_rival_181
text: The ones closest to me are hardest to trust.
text_simple: the ones closest to me are hardest to trust

name: venge_crown_rival_186
text: I thought you smelled bad on the outside.
text_simple: i thought you smelled bad on the outside

name: venge_crown_rival_189
text: You have to do more than wing me, little man.
text_simple: you have to do more than wing me little man

name: venge_crown_rival_193
text: This realm doesn't wan't you. Die with the rest of the self-important demi-gods.
text_simple: this realm doesnt want you die with the rest of the selfimportant demigods

name: venge_crown_rival_198
text: Perhaps your sword wasn't big enough.
text_simple: perhaps your sword wasnt big enough

name: venge_crown_rival_203
text: How many times must I spurn you?
text_simple: how many times must i spurn you

name: venge_crown_rival_207
text: You give obsession a bad look.
text_simple: you give obsession a bad look

name: venge_crown_rival_213
text: Your kind feeds off our filth.
text_simple: your kind feeds off our filth

name: venge_crown_rival_215
text: You poor foul wretch of a thing.
text_simple: you poor foul wretch of a thing

name: venge_crown_rival_233
text: Things were better before you were here.
text_simple: things were better before you were here

name: venge_crown_rival_235
text: Regrets don't wash away your sin.
text_simple: regrets dont wash away your sin

name: venge_crown_rival_240
text: Terrible judgement detracts from your passable aim.
text_simple: terrible judgement detracts from your passable aim

name: venge_crown_rival_243
text: I don't know what you wanted, little man. But enough with your vile tricks.
text_simple: i dont know what you wanted little man but enough with your vile tricks

name: venge_crown_rival_245
text: I know what it means to lose a kingdom. You earned this.
text_simple: i know what it means to lose a kingdom you earned this

name: venge_crown_rival_246
text: Soul stealer. You are worth my vengeance.
text_simple: soul stealer you are worth my vengeance

name: venge_crown_rival_302
text: You are the master of nothing.
text_simple: you are the master of nothing

name: venge_crown_rival_306
text: Not so chatty now, are you?
text_simple: not so chatty now are you

name: venge_crown_sceptor_01
text: I still remember how to cheat death.
text_simple: i still remember how to cheat death

name: venge_crown_shard_01
text: Wait until we see the fear in their eyes.
text_simple: wait until we see the fear in their eyes

name: venge_crown_spawn_02
text: Vengeful Spirit no longer. Shendelzare I remain.
text_simple: vengeful spirit no longer shendelzare i remain

name: venge_crown_spawn_05_alt
text: I have returned for my rightful throne.
text_simple: i have returned for my rightful throne

name: venge_crown_spawn_07
text: Feel the wrath of my vengeance.
text_simple: feel the wrath of my vengeance

name: venge_crown_spawn_08
text: What wretch here is worth my vengeance?
text_simple: what wretch here is worth my vengeance

name: venge_crown_spawn_10
text: My revenge, and my hate, I set loose on this world.
text_simple: my revenge and my hate i set loose on this world

name: venge_crown_swap_06
text: Never turn your back on the queen.
text_simple: never turn your back on the queen

name: venge_crown_swap_07
text: Let me introduce you to my friends.
text_simple: let me introduce you to my friends

name: venge_crown_swap_09
text: I wouldn't want to trade places with you again.
text_simple: i wouldnt want to trade places with you again

name: venge_crown_swap_10
text: I thought I'd see things from your position.
text_simple: i thought id see things from your position

name: venge_crown_teleport_pain_01
text: They might see me take wing...
text_simple: they might see me take wing

name: venge_crown_teleport_pain_03
text: I won't let them take me again.
text_simple: i wont let them take me again

name: venge_crown_thanks_02
text: The crown owes you a debt.
text_simple: the crown owes you a debt

name: venge_crown_twingate_01
text: We should build some in Skywrath.
text_simple: we should build some in skywrath

name: venge_crown_twingate_04
text: For those too lazy -- or busy -- to fly.
text_simple: for those too lazy or busy to fly

name: venge_crown_watcher_02
text: Grant me the honor of your sight.
text_simple: grant me the honor of your sight

name: venge_crown_wheel_all_01
text: Please. At least TRY to make this interesting.
text_simple: please at least try to make this interesting

name: venge_crown_wheel_all_03
text: Do you need me to show you how?
text_simple: do you need me to show you how

name: venge_crown_wheel_all_04
text: What I can see, I can strike.
text_simple: what i can see i can strike

name: venge_crown_wheel_all_07
text: Where do you think you're going?
text_simple: where do you think youre going

name: venge_crown_wheel_all_08
text: I haven't had that much fun since I killed my sister.
text_simple: i havent had that much fun since i killed my sister

name: venge_crown_wheel_all_09
text: You have no place in the skies.
text_simple: you have no place in the skies

name: venge_crown_wheel_all_10
text: You fall better than you fight.
text_simple: you fall better than you fight

name: venge_crown_wheel_all_11
text: If it's any consolation, you never had a chance.
text_simple: if its any consolation you never had a chance

name: venge_crown_wheel_all_12
text: To think you could win was a flight of fancy.
text_simple: to think you could win was a flight of fancy

name: venge_crown_wheel_all_13
text: Stop giving me more reasons to wreak vengeance!
text_simple: stop giving me more reasons to wreak vengeance

name: venge_crown_wheel_all_14
text: I suppose I can always use more practice.
text_simple: i suppose i can always use more practice

name: venge_crown_wheel_all_15
text: I've had more resistance from a gentle breeze.
text_simple: ive had more resistance from a gentle breeze

name: venge_crown_wheel_all_16
text: You surprised me. I expected a challenge.
text_simple: you surprised me i expected a challenge

name: venge_crown_wheel_all_17
text: You should be very proud that you at least tried.
text_simple: you should be very proud that you at least tried

name: venge_crown_wheel_all_18
text: Try to die with some dignity. You're fighting a queen.
text_simple: try to die with some dignity youre fighting a queen

text: Try to die with some dignity. You're fighting a queen.

text: What I can see, I can strike.

text: Where do you think you're going?

name: venge_crown_wheel_all_81_08
text: I haven't had that much fun since I killed my sister.
text_simple: i havent had that much fun since i killed my sister

name: venge_crown_wheel_deny_02
text: In your future? A high fall.
text_simple: in your future a high fall

name: venge_crown_wheel_deny_81_02
text: In your future? A high fall.
text_simple: in your future a high fall

name: venge_crown_wheel_thanks_01
text: When vengeance comes, YOU will be spared.
text_simple: when vengeance comes you will be spared

name: venge_crown_wheel_thanks_02
text: Your service won't be forgotten. Until later.
text_simple: your service wont be forgotten until later

text: When vengeance comes, YOU will be spared.

text: Your service won't be forgotten. Until later.

text: Back to the business of rule.

name: venge_crown_wisdom_03
text: That much closer to finishing this.

name: queen_imperia_cw_already_forgotten
text: Your efforts have already been forgotten.
text_simple: your efforts have already been forgotten

name: queen_imperia_cw_claim_for_crown
text: I claim this for the crown!

name: queen_imperia_cw_dont_deserve_help
text: These wretches don't deserve my help.
text_simple: these wretches dont deserve my help

name: queen_imperia_cw_enjoy_your_final_moments
text: Enjoy your final moments as much as I am.

text: And they will pay for their treachery. In BLOOD.

text: That was terrible. YOU were terrible.
